医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
人工智能生成的交接记录：研究评估急诊医学的安全性和准确性研究人员开发并评估大型语言模型生成的急诊医学交接记录的准确性、安全性和实用性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/AI- generated-handoff-notes-Study-asseses-safety-and-accuracy-in-emergency-medicine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/AI- generated-handoff-notes-Study-asseses-safety-and-accuracy-in-emergency-medicine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0f2c08fc-5579-4170-9255-78e739a63468 Fri, 06 Dec 2024 13:07:00 -0500 AI-generated handoff notes: Study assesses safety and accuracy in emergency medicine
用珍珠串模型重新想象轴突在一项具有争议性的新研究中，科学家们挑战了神经科学中关于轴突形状的基本原则——从神经细胞辐射出的长而细的丝，在细胞之间传输电信号——并提出了一种新模型来理解信息如何在细胞中传递。大脑。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/Reimagining-axons-with-the-pearls-on-a-string-model.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/Reimagining-axons-with-the-pearls-on-a-string-model.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8948d9e5-6311-4175-907f-9d84933d20e9 Fri, 06 Dec 2024 12:53:00 -0500 Reimagining axons with the pearls-on-a-string model
MDMA 改善军事神经康复治疗效果的潜力加州大学洛杉矶分校健康中心对 MDMA 辅助治疗研究的分析表明，该药物可以改善军事人员经历的更广泛的创伤相关病症的治疗结果，超越目前对创伤后应激障碍 (PTSD) 的关注，通过增加协作和客户和治疗师之间的信任关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/MDMAs-pottial-to-improve-therapeutic-outcomes-in-military-neurorehabilitation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/MDMAs-pottial-to-improve-therapeutic-outcomes-in-military-neurorehabilitation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f7b7dcf1-2558-44d4-9f93-3aa5e99f5502 Fri, 06 Dec 2024 12:45:00 -0500 MDMA's potential to improve therapeutic outcomes in military neurorehabilitation
抗抑郁药的使用与持续的生殖器敏感性丧失有关西蒙弗雷泽大学的一项新研究发现，使用抗抑郁药与性副作用有关，包括停止用药后仍持续存在的生殖器敏感性降低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/Antidepressant-use-linked-to-persistent-genital-sensitivity-loss.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/Antidepressant-use-linked-to-persistent-genital-sensitivity-loss.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cc0db733-f960-4264-86ba-99cab5833c25 Fri, 06 Dec 2024 12:39:00 -0500 Antidepressant use linked to persistent genital sensitivity loss
研究：脑容量变化与精神疾病中的社会行为差异相关发表在《分子精神病学》上的一项研究发现，脑容量变化与自闭症谱系障碍和精神分裂症等精神疾病的社会行为差异相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/Study-Brain-volume-changes-correlate-with-social-behavior-differences-in-psychiatric-conditions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/Study-Brain-volume-changes-correlate-with-social-behavior-differences-in-psychiatric-conditions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4e21ee78-af6f-47a4-aa69-100866dde277 Fri, 06 Dec 2024 12:32:17 -0500 Study: Brain volume changes correlate with social behavior differences in psychiatric conditions
HWE反应的突破为抗癌药物开发提供了途径霍纳-沃兹沃斯-埃蒙斯 (HWE) 反应是有机化学中的基本反应，广泛用于生成共轭羰基化合物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/Breakthrough-in-HWE-reaction-offers-pathway-for-anti-cancer-drug-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/Breakthrough-in-HWE-reaction-offers-pathway-for-anti-cancer-drug-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=26f665c1-1e6e-4f8e-9420-8ec1c41f49b1 Fri, 06 Dec 2024 12:24:29 -0500 Breakthrough in HWE reaction offers pathway for anti-cancer drug development
研究确定了先兆子痫的潜在表观遗传生物标志物对孕妇脸颊拭子的分析揭示了先兆子痫的潜在表观遗传生物标志物，这是一种可能危及生命的疾病，通常会导致早产。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/Study-identizes-pottial-epigenic-biomarker-for-preeclampsia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/Study-identizes-pottial-epigenic-biomarker-for-preeclampsia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=64d6d70e-000a-4d41-a475-4e8c905f98ef Fri, 06 Dec 2024 12:18:03 -0500 Study identifies potential epigenetic biomarker for preeclampsia
冰球运动中慢性创伤性脑病的风险随着比赛年份的增加而增加一项针对 77 名男性曲棍球运动员的研究显示，CTE 患病率为 96.4%，强调了比赛时间与慢性脑病风险增加之间的联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/Chronic-traumatic-encephalopathy-risk-in-ice-hockey-increases-with-each-year-played.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/Chronic-traumatic-encephalopathy-risk-in-ice-hockey-increases-with-each-year-played.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=db2f4455-085a-4eaf-8bf6-981b2a83be79 Fri, 06 Dec 2024 11:47:00 -0500 Chronic traumatic encephalopathy risk in ice hockey increases with each year played
研究人员绘制了参与反应抑制的神经通路在看到停车标志并对其做出反应的那一瞬间，我们的大脑进行了一个复杂的过程，从感知无缝过渡到行动控制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/Researchers-map-neural-pathways-involved-in-response-inhibition.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/Researchers-map-neural-pathways-involved-in-response-inhibition.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ee2bc074-dcc1-47bb-babe-4729923b1030 Fri, 06 Dec 2024 11:06:39 -0500 Researchers map neural pathways involved in response inhibition
研究表明，成年人体重指数的降低与医疗保健支出的减少有关一项研究表明，减肥可以显着节省医疗费用，成人体重指数降低 5% 可以节省 7%，体重指数降低 25% 可以节省 30%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/A-reduction-in-BMI-among-adults-is-linked-with-lower-health-care-spending-study-suggests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/A-reduction-in-BMI-among-adults-is-linked-with-lower-health-care-spending-study-suggests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=64e9847c-9c1f-4371-87cf-13a9a33caded Fri, 06 Dec 2024 11:03:00 -0500 A reduction in BMI among adults is associated with lower health care spending, study suggests
